card.note: We are grateful for Odyssey giving Genevieve the courage to trust her instincts and trust her voice.
card.author: The Duskas

card.note: My favorite Odyssey memory is the feeling when we won Regionals. I was so happy!
card.author: Emily

card.note: I am most grateful for the fact that if it weren't for you, we probably wouldn't have made it to States.
card.author: Emily

card.note: I appreciate the way you always reminded us of deadlines. If it weren't for that, nothing would ever have gotten done!
card.author: Emily

card.note: I really enjoyed the feeling at both Regionals and Sates. There was a great environment and it was so much fun being there.
card.author: Emily

card.note: My favorite character was the witch. She was so creative with what she did to her husband, the director (as well as funny)!
card.author: Emily

card.note: Odyssey taught me to always respect my friends and that even if people say they don't need help, help them anyway because something great might come out of it.
card.author: Emily

card.note: Thank you for all of your dedication and hard work!
card.author: The Brockmans

card.note: I'll never forget when we were announced for winning states. "The Not-So-Haunted House, Division 1, Second Place... Wow, can I pronounce this or not?"
card.author: Chloe

card.note: Odyssey taught me to always be creative and work as a team. We are always able to work things out together.
card.author: Chloe

card.note: I thought it was really funny that in the year when we did the Not-So-Haunted House, most of us were dressed as animals with fake ears on!
card.author: Chloe

card.note: My favorite Odyssey memory is worlds. The team was always together, we got to stay up late in dorms, and trade pins!
card.author: Chloe

card.note: I'll never forget trading pins!!! We were almost more focused on pins than the competition!
card.author: Chloe

card.note: I thought it was fun when Genevieve made us all balloon swords and we had a balloon sword battle!
card.author: Chloe

card.note: We were so happy for the team when we beat St. Basil and Owen J Roberts, who seemed to be winning all the problems. We couldn't have done this without our wonderful coaches!
card.author: The Wynns

card.note: Thank you Mrs. Sonn for bringing the Odyssey of the Mind program to New Eagle, and for all of your hard work getting us to Worlds.
card.author: John

card.note: Thank you Mrs. Hallam for being a great coach. All of our achievements like going to States three times and going to Worlds wouldn't have been possible without you.
card.author: John

card.note: Odyssey taught me to think outside the box and to never give up no matter what the circumstances.
card.author: John

card.note: I really enjoyed the competition, as well as the process, and just hanging out as a team.
card.author: John

card.note: One of the funniest memories of Odyssey was at States when we were performing the magician bunny skit and my tail kept falling apart.
card.author: John

card.note: Thank you Mrs. Sonn for being our spontaneous coach at States.
card.author: John

card.note: Odyssey Of The Mind has given me the opportunity to put my creativeness to use.
card.author: Maddie Lundquist

card.note: Coach Hallam brought our team together and taught us how to put our qualities into a great performance.
card.author: Maddie Lundquist

card.note: I will always remember and cherish our time together as the best team I know.
card.author: Maddie Lundquist

card.note: Thank you Allison and Joanne for all of your selfless dedication to Odyssey. John will always cherish the memories created throughout the past six years.
card.author: The Serafims

card.note: Never stop serving up the Kool-Aid!
card.author: Taso

card.note: I will always remember The Sugar Bowl at Regionals
card.author: Nicholas

card.note: Coach Hallam always showed up and tried to keep us on task
card.author: Nicholas

card.note: My favorite memory is winning States and going to Worlds.
card.author: Nicholas

card.note: The balloon fight and Genevieve sliding on stage are some of my favorite memories.
card.author: Nicholas

card.note: Odyssey taught me to be more creative and work better on a team.
card.author: Nicholas

card.note: Thank you for all your hard work and your great organizational skills!
card.author: Joanne

card.note: "I've got the balloon fortress and the toilet, you get the detonator" Words that can only make sense if you are in Odyssey of the Mind!
card.author: Joanne

card.note: I appreciate the way Coach Hallam was able to keep the team on track while still letting us do our own thing.
card.author: Genevieve

card.note: Odyssey taught me the importance of working together as a team and to listen to everyone because they might have a really good idea even though they aren't sharing it.
card.author: Genevieve

card.note: My favorite part of odyssey was when we won states. The feeling that we were moving on was something that I will never forget.
card.author: Genevieve

card.note: My favorite character was the director because he was really funny. During the competitions everyone was laughing when he got hurt.
card.author: Genevieve

card.note: I will always remember when I made balloon swords for everyone and we had a balloon sword fight while we waited for the other teams to finish so we could perform.
card.author: Genevieve

card.note: We are grateful for all the tireless hours, time, love, mentoring, organizing, teaching, patience, and work that the coaches put into helping the kids each year.
card.author: The Duskas
